mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.group_code AS "groupCode", a.group_name AS "groupName", a.data_set AS "dataSet", scds.name AS "dataSetName"
LEFT JOIN sys_common_data_set scds ON a.data_set = scds.code
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_oms_business_service_scope ( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, group_code, group_name, data_set ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{groupCode}, #{groupName}, #{dataSet} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_oms_business_service_scope SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, group_code = #{groupCode}, group_name = #{groupName}, data_set = #{dataSet} WHERE id = #{id}
